duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide supportive services to participants in the home, community, and day health center, under the supervision of a registered nurse.
Assist participants and their families toward achieving maximum self-reliance and independence within their environment.

Perform care and services outlined in individual participant’s Care Plan, including personal care, assistance with activities, meal preparation, toileting assistance, medication reminders, and transportation support.
Responsible for accurate and timely documentation of care and services provided on every visit, transport, and appointment.
Respond to emergency situations in accordance with established policies and procedures.
Perform duties in an atmosphere of frequent interruption and frequent walking, bending, and lifting of forty (40) pounds or more may be needed in the performance of duties.

education_certification.credential: Certification in direct care, patient care, or medical assistance preferred
